author: John R
title: Attention to detail, staff who listen
text:
We booked the Novotel Hammersmith for one night, our 13th wedding anniversary with a concert at the Apollo nearby. One, we got 'customer of the day' upgrade (=two breakfasts FOC). Two the room was very nice, the bed perfect, totally silent, a great view over the Thames/London cityscape, the Shard and so on. Three, halfway through breakfast the duty manager Manuel produced a large plate with Happy Anniversary written in chocolate, a candle, fresh fruit and a centrepiece, gateau etc. The desk staff (Giusy, an Italian) listened. The Novotel's people quietly impressed us with their skill. Well done. They made two new friends.
Room Tip: Ask for a Thames view and the highest floor they can do - there are 9. See more room tips
